data.content:
Olaf - The Berserker

Release Date: February 21, 2010

Olaf, known as the Berserker, is a fearsome warrior hailing from the icy lands of Freljord in the world of League of Legends. With his relentless aggression and indomitable spirit, Olaf embodies the true essence of a Viking warrior. Armed with his trusty axes, he charges into battle, fueled by an insatiable bloodlust that knows no bounds.

Background Story

Olaf's tale begins in the harsh and unforgiving lands of Freljord, a frozen wasteland where only the strongest survive. Born into a clan of warriors, Olaf was raised to be a fierce and relentless fighter. From a young age, he displayed an unmatched ferocity and an unyielding determination to prove himself in battle.

As he grew older, Olaf's reputation as a fearsome warrior spread throughout Freljord. He became known for his berserker rage, a state of uncontrollable fury that granted him immense strength and endurance in combat. Legends were told of his exploits, and his name struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.

However, Olaf's insatiable thirst for battle eventually led him to a fateful encounter with the Frostguard, a powerful and ancient order of ice mages. Seeking to harness his raw power, they captured Olaf and subjected him to a series of cruel experiments. But Olaf's indomitable will and unyielding spirit proved too strong for the Frostguard to break.

Escaping his captors, Olaf emerged from his ordeal stronger than ever, his body infused with the power of ice magic. Now wielding his enchanted axes, he seeks to reclaim his rightful place as the most feared warrior in Freljord and to prove that no force in the world can stand against the might of a true berserker.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Olaf's kit is designed to make him an unstoppable force on the battlefield. His passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health, allowing him to dish out devastating damage even when on the brink of death. This synergizes perfectly with his ultimate ability, Ragnarok, which grants him immunity to crowd control effects and further increases his attack damage.

One of Olaf's greatest strengths is his ability to sustain himself in fights. His Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axes in a line, damaging and slowing enemies hit. If Olaf picks up his axes, the ability's cooldown is reduced, making it a powerful tool for chasing down enemies or escaping sticky situations. His W ability, Vicious Strikes, grants him lifesteal and bonus attack damage, allowing him to heal up and deal significant damage in extended engagements.

However, Olaf does have his weaknesses. Despite his high damage output, he lacks mobility and crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to kiting and crowd control-heavy compositions. Additionally, his reliance on being low on health to maximize his damage potential can make him an easy target for burst damage champions.

Olaf's Place in the Game

Olaf is a champion that excels in the top lane and jungle roles. His ability to sustain himself in fights and deal massive damage makes him a formidable duelist and a threat in team fights. His ultimate ability, Ragnarok, allows him to dive into the enemy backline without fear of being locked down, making him a great initiator.

Olaf's playstyle revolves around being aggressive and constantly pressuring his opponents. His ability to chase down enemies with his Q and his relentless pursuit of battle make him a nightmare for squishy carries. However, he requires careful positioning and decision-making, as diving headfirst into the enemy team without proper support can lead to his downfall.

Overall, Olaf is a champion that rewards players who enjoy a high-risk, high-reward playstyle. His raw power and relentless aggression make him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Whether you're a fan of Viking lore or simply enjoy playing aggressive melee champions, Olaf is a champion that will satisfy your thirst for bloodshed.

For more information on Olaf's skins and to watch videos showcasing his different appearances, please visit our dedicated page on the League of Legends website.

Olaf (Dragonslayer Olaf)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 5, 2015

Dragonslayer Olaf is a fearsome skin that transforms Olaf, the Berserker, into a valiant dragon slayer. With his imposing armor and mighty axe, Olaf is ready to take on any dragon that crosses his path. This skin is a part of the Dragonslayer skin line, which features champions who have dedicated themselves to hunting down and slaying these mythical creatures.

The Dragonslayer Olaf skin gives Olaf a complete visual overhaul, turning him into a formidable warrior ready to face the most dangerous of dragons. His armor is adorned with intricate dragon-themed designs, and his axe is now a massive weapon with a dragon head as its blade. The skin also includes new visual effects for Olaf's abilities, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

Olaf, the Berserker, is a powerful champion in the game League of Legends. Known for his relentless aggression and unstoppable nature, Olaf is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. He is a melee fighter who excels at dealing damage and diving into the heart of the enemy team.

Olaf's story in the game is one of tragedy and redemption. Once a proud warrior of the Freljord, Olaf was cursed with an unending hunger for battle. He fought relentlessly, seeking glory and honor, but his insatiable bloodlust eventually led him down a dark path. Consumed by his own rage, Olaf lost control and became a mindless berserker, feared by all who crossed his path.

However, Olaf's story took a turn when he encountered the legendary dragon, Vilemaw. In a battle against the monstrous creature, Olaf found himself on the brink of death. But instead of succumbing to his wounds, Olaf made a pact with the dragon, gaining its power and becoming the Dragonslayer he is today.

Now, Olaf roams the land, hunting down dragons and seeking redemption for his past sins. With his newfound strength and determination, he has become a symbol of hope for those who have lost their way. Olaf's journey is one of self-discovery and redemption, as he fights to overcome his inner demons and find peace.

In the game, Olaf is a versatile champion who can be played in various roles. His kit revolves around his ability to deal massive damage while being incredibly durable. Olaf's passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health, allowing him to become even more dangerous as he takes damage.

Olaf's Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axe in a line, damaging and slowing enemies it hits. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced, allowing for repeated throws and increased damage output. His W ability, Vicious Strikes, grants him lifesteal and bonus attack damage, making him even more resilient in combat.

Olaf's E ability, Reckless Swing, is a powerful single-target ability that deals true damage to the target at the cost of Olaf's own health. This ability is particularly effective against tanky champions, as it bypasses their armor and deals a significant amount of damage. Finally, Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants him immunity to crowd control effects and increases his attack damage, making him an unstoppable force in team fights.

With his unique playstyle and powerful abilities, Olaf has found his place in the game as a top-tier pick in both professional and casual play. His ability to dive into the enemy team and disrupt their backline makes him a valuable asset in team fights, while his dueling potential allows him to hold his own in one-on-one skirmishes.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Olaf's various appearances in the game. Whether it's the fearsome Dragonslayer Olaf or any other skin, you can explore the different looks and visual effects that Olaf has to offer. Embrace the power of the Berserker and join Olaf on his quest for redemption!

Olaf (Sentinel Olaf)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: April 29, 2021

Olaf, the Berserker, is a fearsome warrior hailing from the icy lands of Freljord. Known for his relentless aggression and indomitable spirit, Olaf has become a staple pick in the League of Legends. With his latest skin,

players can now experience a new side of this formidable champion.

Sentinel Olaf is a skin that embodies the essence of a guardian, a protector of justice and order. Clad in shining armor, Olaf takes on the role of a sentinel, standing tall against any threat that dares to challenge him. This skin offers a fresh and unique visual experience for Olaf players, giving them the opportunity to showcase their dedication to justice on the battlefield.

The design of Sentinel Olaf is truly remarkable. The armor is intricately detailed, with polished silver plates that reflect the light, giving it a majestic and imposing appearance. The helmet features a visor adorned with intricate engravings, adding an extra touch of elegance to the overall design. The color scheme of the skin is predominantly silver and blue, symbolizing the unwavering loyalty and dedication of a true sentinel.

One of the standout features of Sentinel Olaf is his weapon. Instead of his usual axes, Olaf wields a massive, ornate hammer. The hammer is adorned with intricate engravings and emits a faint blue glow, further enhancing the skin's visual appeal. With each swing of the hammer, players can feel the weight and power behind Olaf's strikes, making every attack feel impactful and satisfying.

In addition to the stunning visual design, Sentinel Olaf also boasts new animations and sound effects. Each ability has been carefully crafted to match the theme of a sentinel. From the moment Olaf charges into battle with his ultimate ability, Ragnarok, to the thunderous impact of his hammer on his enemies, every action feels immersive and true to the skin's concept.

Now, let's delve into the story of Olaf and his place in the League of Legends. Olaf, once a renowned warrior of the Freljord, sought glory and honor through battle. He was known for his unyielding determination and his ability to tap into a primal rage, making him an unstoppable force on the battlefield.

Olaf's past in the game is filled with triumphs and defeats. He has undergone several changes and adjustments to his abilities, ensuring that he remains a viable and balanced champion. His kit revolves around his ability to sustain damage and deal devastating blows to his enemies. With his passive ability, Berserker Rage, Olaf gains bonus attack speed based on his missing health, allowing him to become even deadlier as he takes damage.

Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants him immunity to crowd control effects, making him a formidable force in team fights. This ability, combined with his high damage output and sustain, makes Olaf a terrifying presence on the battlefield. However, his lack of mobility and reliance on being in the thick of the fight can leave him vulnerable if not played strategically.

Olaf's place in the game is primarily as a top laner or a jungler. His ability to sustain damage and his high damage output make him a strong pick in these roles. Olaf excels in extended fights, where his passive and ultimate ability allow him to outlast his opponents and secure kills. However, he can struggle against champions with high burst damage or those who can kite him effectively.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Olaf, including his base skin and other available skins. Whether you prefer the classic look of Olaf or want to explore the new and exciting options, this page will serve as a comprehensive resource for all things Olaf.

Olaf (Brolaf)

Cost: 1820 RP | Release Date: April 1, 2011

Olaf, the Berserker, is a fearsome warrior hailing from the icy Freljord. Known for his relentless pursuit of battle and his indomitable spirit, Olaf has become a fan favorite in the League of Legends community. With his iconic axe and Viking-inspired appearance, Olaf embodies the spirit of a true warrior.

One of Olaf's most popular skins is

a humorous and lighthearted take on the champion. Brolaf was released on April 1, 2011, as a part of Riot Games' April Fools' Day celebration. Packed with humor and references to popular culture, Brolaf quickly became a hit among players.

The Brolaf skin transforms Olaf into a party-loving, beach-dwelling bro. Clad in board shorts, a tank top, and sporting a pair of sunglasses, Brolaf is ready to hit the beach and have a good time. His iconic axe is replaced with a giant foam finger, adding to the playful nature of the skin.

One of the standout features of the Brolaf skin is the voiceover. Olaf's voice is replaced with a surfer dude accent, complete with slang and catchphrases. The voice lines are filled with humor and references to popular culture, making Brolaf a joy to play with.

While Brolaf may be a departure from Olaf's usual serious and battle-hardened appearance, it adds a fun and light-hearted twist to the champion. It's a skin that allows players to enjoy Olaf's gameplay while also injecting some humor into their matches.

Olaf: The Berserker

Olaf, the Berserker, is a melee champion in League of Legends known for his relentless aggression and high damage output. He excels in close-quarters combat and thrives on diving into the heart of the enemy team.

Olaf's passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health. This ability synergizes well with his playstyle, allowing him to become stronger as he takes damage. It encourages players to dive into fights head-on, embracing the role of a true berserker.

Olaf's Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axe in a line, damaging and slowing enemies it passes through. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced, rewarding players for accurate axe throws and creating opportunities for repeated harass or engage.

Vicious Strikes, Olaf's W ability, grants him bonus lifesteal and increased healing from all sources. This ability enhances his sustain in fights, making him difficult to take down when combined with his passive ability. It also provides a significant boost to his damage output, allowing him to shred through enemies.

Olaf's E ability, Reckless Swing, is a single-target ability that deals true damage to the target at the cost of Olaf's own health. This ability is a powerful tool for bursting down high-health targets or finishing off low-health enemies. It adds to Olaf's overall damage potential and makes him a threat to squishy champions.

Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, is a game-changer. When activated, Ragnarok grants Olaf immunity to crowd control effects and increases his attack damage. This ability allows Olaf to charge into the enemy team without fear of being locked down, making him a formidable force in team fights.

Olaf's playstyle revolves around diving into the enemy team, soaking up damage, and dealing massive amounts of damage in return. His kit rewards aggressive and calculated play, making him a favorite among players who enjoy high-risk, high-reward champions.

In the lore of League of Legends, Olaf is a warrior from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land. He is driven by a desire for glory and seeks to prove himself in battle. Olaf's past is shrouded in mystery, but his reputation as a fearsome warrior has earned him a place in the League of Legends, where he can showcase his skills and seek the ultimate challenge.

Olaf's appearance in the game reflects his Viking-inspired origins. With his rugged beard, battle-worn armor, and imposing stature, Olaf embodies the spirit of a true warrior. His abilities and playstyle further emphasize his aggressive nature, making him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Olaf's appearances, including the Brolaf skin. Whether you prefer the serious and battle-hardened Olaf or the lighthearted and fun-loving Brolaf, there's a version of the champion that suits your playstyle.

Olaf (SKT T1 Olaf)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: April 30, 2015

SKT T1 Olaf is a skin for the fearsome Viking warrior, Olaf, in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on April 30, 2015, and is part of the SKT T1 skin line, which celebrates the victories of the South Korean professional esports team, SK Telecom T1, in the League of Legends World Championships.

Olaf, known as the Berserker, is a relentless and powerful champion who excels in close combat. With his massive axe and unstoppable determination, Olaf charges into battle, fearlessly taking down his enemies. The SKT T1 Olaf skin gives a unique twist to this already formidable champion, showcasing his affiliation with the legendary SK Telecom T1 team.

The SKT T1 Olaf skin transforms Olaf into a true warrior of the team, donning the iconic black and red colors of SK Telecom T1. His armor is adorned with the team's logo, proudly displaying his allegiance. The skin also features new visual effects, including a fiery red trail when Olaf activates his ultimate ability, Ragnarok. This skin truly embodies the spirit of SK Telecom T1 and allows players to show their support for the team while dominating the battlefield.

Olaf's story within the League of Legends universe is one of a relentless warrior seeking glory and battle. Hailing from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land, Olaf is driven by his desire to die a glorious death in combat. He believes that only in battle can he prove his worth and earn his place in the halls of Valhalla.

In the game, Olaf is known for his incredible durability and damage output. His passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health, allowing him to become even deadlier as he takes damage. His Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axe, damaging and slowing enemies in its path. Olaf's W ability, Vicious Strikes, grants him lifesteal and bonus attack damage, making him a formidable force in sustained fights.

Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, is a game-changer. When activated, Ragnarok grants Olaf immunity to crowd control effects, allowing him to charge fearlessly into the enemy team without being hindered by stuns, slows, or other disabling effects. This ability, combined with Olaf's innate tankiness and damage, makes him a terrifying force to be reckoned with.

Olaf's place in the game is primarily as a top lane or jungle champion. His ability to sustain himself in fights and deal significant damage makes him a strong pick for players who enjoy aggressive playstyles. Olaf excels in duels and skirmishes, where his ability to stick to targets and deal consistent damage shines.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Olaf's appearances, including the SKT T1 Olaf skin. Whether you're a fan of Olaf or a supporter of SK Telecom T1, this skin allows you to showcase your love for the team while dominating the battlefield as the fearsome Viking warrior.

Olaf (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Olaf, the Berserker, is a fearsome warrior hailing from the frozen lands of Freljord in the world of League of Legends. As one of the original champions in the game, Olaf has become an iconic figure known for his relentless aggression and indomitable spirit. While Olaf has several skins that offer unique visual and thematic changes, his default skin remains the true representation of his character and story.

The default skin for Olaf showcases his rugged and battle-hardened appearance. Clad in a tattered fur loincloth and adorned with various tribal tattoos, Olaf exudes a primal aura that perfectly complements his aggressive playstyle. His muscular physique and wild, unkempt hair further emphasize his status as a fierce warrior. Armed with his signature weapon, a massive double-headed axe, Olaf is always ready to charge into battle and unleash his fury upon his enemies.

While the default skin may lack the flashy effects and thematic changes of his alternate skins, it captures the essence of Olaf's character. It represents his raw power, unyielding determination, and his connection to the harsh environment of Freljord. The simplicity of the default skin allows players to focus on Olaf's gameplay mechanics and appreciate the core aspects of his design.

Olaf's story within the League of Legends universe is one of tragedy and redemption. Once a proud and respected warrior, Olaf's life took a dark turn when his village was attacked by a monstrous ice troll. In a desperate attempt to save his people, Olaf made a pact with the Freljordian demigod, Volibear. However, this pact came at a great cost. Olaf lost his sanity and became consumed by an uncontrollable rage, earning him the title of the Berserker.

Despite his inner turmoil, Olaf seeks redemption and a way to regain control over his mind. He ventures into the League of Legends, hoping to find a cure for his affliction. In the game, Olaf is known for his relentless pursuit of his enemies, charging into battle with reckless abandon. His abilities, such as his Undertow and Ragnarok, allow him to deal massive damage while shrugging off crowd control effects. Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants him immunity to disables, making him a formidable force in team fights.

Olaf's playstyle revolves around his passive ability, Berserker Rage, which grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health. This encourages players to play aggressively and dive into the heart of the enemy team, relying on Olaf's innate durability and damage output to secure kills. However, Olaf's all-in playstyle also leaves him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage, making positioning and timing crucial for success.

In the ever-evolving world of League of Legends, Olaf has remained a staple pick for players who enjoy a high-risk, high-reward playstyle. His relentless pursuit of victory and his unwavering determination make him a beloved champion among fans. Whether you choose to embrace his default skin or explore his alternate appearances, Olaf's story and gameplay will continue to captivate players for years to come.

For more information about Olaf and to witness his various appearances in action, be sure to visit this page. Watch videos, learn about his abilities, and discover the many ways you can unleash the fury of the Berserker on the Fields of Justice.

Olaf (Forsaken Olaf)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2011

Olaf, the Berserker, is a fearsome warrior hailing from the icy Freljord. Known for his relentless pursuit of battle and his indomitable spirit, Olaf has become a fan-favorite champion in the popular online game, League of Legends. With his iconic axe and Viking-inspired appearance, Olaf has captured the hearts of players worldwide.

One of the many ways Riot Games, the creators of League of Legends, keep the game fresh and exciting is by introducing new skins for champions. These skins not only change the appearance of the champion but also add a unique touch to their lore and story. One such skin is

which offers players a fresh take on this formidable warrior.

Released on November 29, 2011, Forsaken Olaf quickly became a popular choice among players. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers a visually stunning transformation for Olaf, giving him a dark and haunting appearance. The skin features Olaf clad in tattered armor, with glowing blue eyes and a menacing aura. The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable, with intricate designs on his armor and a weathered look that perfectly captures the essence of a forsaken warrior.

But the visual appeal is not the only thing that makes Forsaken Olaf special. The skin also adds a new layer to Olaf's story. In the League of Legends lore, Olaf is a warrior who seeks an honorable death in battle. However, the Forsaken Olaf skin takes a different approach, portraying Olaf as a fallen warrior consumed by darkness and despair. This alternate storyline adds depth to Olaf's character and allows players to explore a different side of his personality.

Olaf's story in the game is one of tragedy and triumph. Hailing from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land, Olaf was once a member of a mighty Viking clan. However, his clan was decimated by a powerful enemy, leaving Olaf as the sole survivor. Determined to avenge his fallen comrades, Olaf embarked on a quest for glory and redemption.

Olaf's strength lies in his relentless pursuit of battle. He is a melee champion who excels in close combat, using his massive axe to cleave through enemies with ease. Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants him immunity to crowd control effects, allowing him to charge into the heart of battle without fear. This makes him a formidable force on the battlefield, capable of diving into the enemy team and disrupting their ranks.

However, Olaf also has his weaknesses. His reliance on close combat makes him vulnerable to ranged champions who can keep their distance. Additionally, Olaf's abilities consume his health as a resource, making him susceptible to burst damage. Players must carefully manage Olaf's health and resources to ensure his survival in battle.

In the world of League of Legends, Olaf has found his place as a powerful and iconic champion. His Viking-inspired design and relentless playstyle have made him a favorite among players who enjoy a more aggressive and in-your-face approach to combat. Whether charging into battle with his default appearance or donning the haunting Forsaken Olaf skin, Olaf is a force to be reckoned with.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Olaf's appearances, including the Forsaken Olaf skin. Explore the different facets of this fearsome warrior and discover the many ways you can unleash his fury on the Fields of Justice.

Olaf (Butcher Olaf)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2010

Butcher Olaf is a fearsome skin for the mighty Viking warrior, Olaf, in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin transforms Olaf into a menacing butcher, ready to cleave through his enemies with his massive axe. Released on November 29, 2010, Butcher Olaf quickly became a favorite among players who wanted to showcase Olaf's brutal and savage side.

Butcher Olaf's appearance is truly terrifying. Olaf dons a blood-stained apron, complete with various tools of the trade hanging from his belt. His armor is adorned with spikes, giving him an even more menacing look. His axe, the weapon of choice for any butcher, is massive and intimidating, with a jagged blade that strikes fear into the hearts of his foes.

Butcher Olaf's abilities also receive a thematic makeover. His Q ability, Undertow, now features a meat cleaver instead of a regular axe, adding to the butcher theme. His W ability, Vicious Strikes, showcases a blood splatter effect when activated, emphasizing the brutality of his attacks. Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, is accompanied by a thunderous sound effect, further enhancing the intensity of his transformation into an unstoppable force.

Now, let's delve into the story of Olaf and his place in the League of Legends universe. Olaf, known as the Berserker, hails from the icy Freljord region. He is a warrior who seeks glorious death in battle, believing that only in death can one truly prove their worth. Olaf's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is said that he has faced countless foes and emerged victorious from each encounter.

In the game, Olaf is a melee champion who excels in close-quarters combat. His kit revolves around his ability to sustain damage and deal devastating blows to his enemies. Olaf's passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health, making him even deadlier as he takes damage. His Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axe, damaging and slowing enemies in its path. Olaf's W ability, Vicious Strikes, grants him lifesteal and bonus attack damage, making him incredibly difficult to take down in a fight. His E ability, Reckless Swing, deals true damage to his target at the cost of his own health, allowing him to quickly dispatch high-health enemies. Finally, Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants him immunity to crowd control effects, making him unstoppable and allowing him to charge into the heart of battle without fear.

Olaf's playstyle revolves around his ability to dive into the enemy team, soaking up damage while dealing significant damage in return. His sustain and tankiness make him a formidable force in team fights, and his ability to ignore crowd control effects with Ragnarok allows him to disrupt the enemy backline and eliminate priority targets.

Butcher Olaf is just one of the many skins available for Olaf in League of Legends. Each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience, allowing players to customize their champion to their liking. Whether you prefer the savage brutality of Butcher Olaf or the regal elegance of Marauder Olaf, there is a skin for every taste.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Olaf's appearances, including Butcher Olaf. Explore the different skins and unleash the full potential of this fearsome Viking warrior.

Olaf (Pentakill Olaf)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: June 3, 2010

Olaf, the Berserker, is a fearsome warrior hailing from the icy Freljord. Known for his relentless pursuit of battle and his indomitable spirit, Olaf has become a fan-favorite champion in the popular online game, League of Legends. With his release on June 9, 2010, Olaf quickly gained a dedicated following due to his unique playstyle and powerful abilities.

One of the most iconic aspects of League of Legends is the vast array of skins available for each champion. These skins not only provide a visual upgrade but also offer players a chance to immerse themselves in the lore and thematic elements of the game. One such skin is

which pays homage to the heavy metal band, Pentakill, within the League of Legends universe.

Pentakill Olaf is a legendary skin that transforms Olaf into a rockstar, complete with a guitar-shaped axe and a stage-ready outfit. Released on June 3, 2010, this skin quickly became a favorite among players who wanted to showcase their love for both Olaf and the heavy metal genre.

The skin features Olaf donning a black leather jacket adorned with spikes and chains, perfectly capturing the rebellious spirit of heavy metal. His traditional Viking helmet is replaced with a stylish bandana, and his beard is braided, giving him a more rockstar appearance. The most striking aspect of the skin is Olaf's axe, which is transformed into a guitar, complete with strings and a headstock. With every swing, Olaf unleashes a powerful riff, adding a unique audio element to the skin.

Playing as Pentakill Olaf not only provides a visual upgrade but also immerses players in the world of heavy metal. The skin's recall animation shows Olaf rocking out on stage, surrounded by pyrotechnics and adoring fans. Additionally, his abilities are accompanied by heavy metal sound effects, further enhancing the thematic experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Olaf and his place in the League of Legends universe. Olaf, known as the Berserker, hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land. He is a warrior who seeks glory and honor through battle, embracing the frenzy of combat. Olaf's relentless pursuit of victory has earned him a fearsome reputation, and he is often seen as an embodiment of the Viking spirit.

In the game, Olaf is a melee champion who excels in close-quarters combat. His passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health, allowing him to become even more dangerous as he takes damage. His Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axe, damaging and slowing enemies in its path. Olaf's W ability, Vicious Strikes, grants him lifesteal and bonus attack damage, making him a formidable duelist. His E ability, Reckless Swing, deals true damage to his target at the cost of his own health. Finally, his ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants Olaf immunity to crowd control effects, allowing him to charge fearlessly into battle.

Olaf's playstyle revolves around his ability to dive into the enemy team, soaking up damage while dealing significant damage of his own. His ultimate ability, Ragnarok, makes him immune to crowd control, allowing him to disrupt the enemy team and focus down high-priority targets. Olaf's strength lies in his ability to sustain himself in fights, thanks to his lifesteal and bonus attack damage from Vicious Strikes.

However, Olaf does have weaknesses. He is highly reliant on his ultimate ability, Ragnarok, to engage effectively. Without it, he can be easily locked down and focused by the enemy team. Additionally, Olaf's damage output is primarily single-target, making him less effective against teams with multiple tanks or high amounts of crowd control.

Olaf's story within the League of Legends universe is intertwined with the larger narrative of the Freljord. As a champion from this icy region, Olaf has been involved in various conflicts and events, including the battle for control over the Freljord between Ashe, Sejuani, and Lissandra. Olaf's fierce determination and unwavering spirit make him a key player in the ongoing struggles of the Freljord.

Overall, Olaf is a beloved champion in League of Legends, known for his relentless pursuit of battle and his indomitable spirit. With his Pentakill Olaf skin, players can showcase their love for both Olaf and heavy metal, immersing themselves in the thematic elements of the game. Whether you're a fan of Olaf's Viking heritage or a lover of heavy metal, Pentakill Olaf is a skin that truly rocks.

For more information about Olaf and his various appearances, including Pentakill Olaf, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the Berserker. Watch videos, explore his abilities, and discover the many ways you can dominate the battlefield as Olaf.

Olaf (Glacial Olaf)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2012

Olaf, the Berserker, is a fearsome warrior hailing from the icy lands of Freljord. Known for his relentless pursuit of battle and his indomitable spirit, Olaf has become a fan-favorite champion in the popular online game, League of Legends. With his Glacial Olaf skin, players can experience a frosty twist on this formidable warrior.

Glacial Olaf is a visually stunning skin that transforms Olaf into a frozen warrior, ready to conquer the battlefield with his icy might. The skin features Olaf clad in frost-covered armor, complete with a helmet adorned with icy spikes. His axe, once a formidable weapon, is now encased in ice, adding an extra layer of chilling power to his attacks. As Olaf charges into battle, his footsteps leave behind frosty trails, leaving no doubt of his glacial origins.

Released on November 29, 2012, Glacial Olaf quickly became a popular choice among players who wanted to add a touch of frost to their battles. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a significant visual upgrade to Olaf's base appearance, making it a worthwhile investment for fans of the champion.

The Story of Olaf

Olaf, the Berserker, has a rich lore that adds depth to his character and explains his relentless pursuit of battle. Hailing from the icy lands of Freljord, Olaf is a member of the Avarosan tribe, known for their fierce warriors. Olaf's story begins with his desire to prove himself as the greatest warrior in Freljord, a land where strength and valor are highly revered.

Olaf's journey takes him through countless battles, where he earns his reputation as an unstoppable force on the battlefield. His relentless pursuit of glory and his willingness to face any opponent, no matter the odds, have made him a legend among his people. Olaf's signature battle cry,

echoes through the frozen tundra, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.

Despite his fearsome reputation, Olaf is not without his weaknesses. His single-minded pursuit of battle often leads him to disregard his own safety, making him vulnerable to strategic opponents who can exploit his reckless nature. Additionally, Olaf's reliance on his berserker rage can sometimes cloud his judgment, causing him to make impulsive decisions that may not always be in his best interest.

In the game, Olaf is classified as a melee fighter and excels in close-quarters combat. His kit is designed to maximize his damage output and sustain, making him a formidable opponent in the top lane. Olaf's passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health, allowing him to dish out devastating blows as he nears death. His Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axe, damaging and slowing enemies in its path. Olaf's W ability, Vicious Strikes, grants him lifesteal and bonus attack damage, further enhancing his sustain in battle. His E ability, Reckless Swing, deals true damage to his target at the cost of his own health, making it a powerful finishing move. Finally, Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants him immunity to crowd control effects, allowing him to charge into battle without fear of being disabled.

Olaf's place in the game is that of a strong duelist and split-pusher. His ability to sustain in fights and deal significant damage makes him a threat in one-on-one engagements. However, Olaf's lack of mobility and reliance on his ultimate for crowd control immunity can make him susceptible to coordinated team strategies that focus on disabling him before he can wreak havoc on the enemy team.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Olaf's appearances, including the Glacial Olaf skin. Whether you prefer the frosty aesthetic of Glacial Olaf or the classic look of the Berserker, Olaf offers a thrilling gameplay experience for those who seek the thrill of battle in the frozen lands of Freljord.

Olaf (Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Olaf)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: June 9, 2021

Olaf, the Berserker, has always been a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice. Known for his relentless aggression and unwavering determination, Olaf has carved his name into the annals of League of Legends history. And now, with the release of the Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Olaf skin, he takes his place as a legendary rocker in the world of music.

The Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Olaf skin is a testament to Olaf's transformation from a fearsome warrior to a rockstar. Clad in black leather pants, a studded vest, and a spiked wristband, Olaf exudes a rebellious and edgy vibe. His long, wild hair flows freely as he wields his signature axe, now adorned with musical notes and symbols. The skin also features unique visual and sound effects, immersing players in the electrifying atmosphere of a live concert.

But what sets the Pentakill III: Lost Chapter Olaf skin apart is the story behind it. In the League of Legends lore, Pentakill is a fictional heavy metal band comprised of champions from the game. Olaf, being a member of Pentakill, embraces his musical alter ego in this skin. The Lost Chapter refers to a new chapter in Pentakill's journey, where they face challenges and embark on a quest for musical greatness.

Olaf's journey with Pentakill began when he discovered his passion for music during a break from the battlefield. Inspired by the power of heavy metal, Olaf picked up a guitar and started writing songs that reflected his warrior spirit. His raw and intense music caught the attention of the other members of Pentakill, and they invited him to join their band.

As a member of Pentakill, Olaf brings his unique style and energy to the stage. His performances are a spectacle of raw power and unbridled passion. With his axe in hand, he shreds through guitar solos while unleashing his berserker fury on stage. The crowd goes wild as Olaf's music resonates with their own inner warriors, igniting a fire within their souls.

In the game, Olaf is a fearsome champion known for his relentless pursuit of victory. His kit revolves around his ability to dive into the enemy team, dealing massive damage and shrugging off crowd control effects. Olaf's passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health, making him even deadlier as he nears the brink of death.

Olaf's Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axe in a line, damaging and slowing enemies it passes through. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced, rewarding skilled axe management. His W ability, Vicious Strikes, grants him lifesteal and bonus attack damage for a short duration, allowing him to sustain in fights and deal increased damage.

Olaf's E ability, Reckless Swing, is a single-target ability that deals true damage to the target at the cost of Olaf's own health. This ability is particularly effective against tanky champions, as it bypasses their resistances. Finally, Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants him immunity to crowd control effects for a few seconds, allowing him to charge into the enemy team without fear of being locked down.

Olaf's strengths lie in his ability to dive into the backline and eliminate high-priority targets. His relentless pursuit and high damage output make him a nightmare for squishy carries. Additionally, his ability to shrug off crowd control effects with his ultimate makes him difficult to control and lock down.

However, Olaf does have weaknesses. He lacks mobility and relies heavily on running straight at his enemies, making him susceptible to kiting and crowd control. Additionally, his damage output is heavily reliant on being low on health, which can be a double-edged sword if not managed properly.

Overall, Olaf is a powerful champion with a unique playstyle that rewards aggression and calculated risk-taking. Whether on the battlefield or on the stage with Pentakill, Olaf leaves a lasting impression with his raw power and unwavering determination.

With his relentless pursuit of glory and his unwavering determination, Olaf has become a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice.

One of Olaf's most popular skins is the Marauder Olaf skin, which was released on March 5, 2015. This skin transforms Olaf into a fearsome warrior, clad in heavy armor and ready for battle. The Marauder Olaf skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP.

As a Marauder, Olaf embodies the spirit of a ruthless raider, always seeking out new conquests and challenges. The skin features intricate details, such as the weathered and battle-worn armor, the menacing helmet adorned with horns, and the intimidating axe that Olaf wields with deadly precision.

The Marauder Olaf skin also includes new visual effects, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience. Olaf's abilities are enhanced with fiery effects, making each strike feel more impactful and powerful. The skin also features unique recall animations, allowing Olaf to showcase his dominance on the battlefield.

Now, let's delve into the story of Olaf and his place in the League of Legends universe. Olaf hails from the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land where only the strongest survive. He is a warrior of the highest caliber, known for his unmatched strength and his unyielding determination.

Olaf's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he was once a member of a powerful warband known as the Avarosan. However, Olaf's thirst for battle and his insatiable desire for glory led him down a different path. He became a lone raider, traveling the Freljord in search of worthy opponents and legendary treasures.

In the game, Olaf is a melee champion who excels in close-quarters combat. His kit is designed to make him a fearsome duelist, capable of dealing massive damage while shrugging off enemy attacks. Olaf's passive ability, Berserker Rage, grants him bonus attack speed based on his missing health, allowing him to become even more dangerous as he takes damage.

Olaf's Q ability, Undertow, allows him to throw his axe in a line, damaging and slowing enemies it passes through. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced, rewarding skilled players who can catch their weapon mid-flight. Olaf's W ability, Vicious Strikes, grants him lifesteal and bonus attack damage for a short duration, making him even more resilient in combat.

Olaf's E ability, Reckless Swing, is a powerful single-target ability that deals true damage to his target at the cost of his own health. This ability can be devastating when used correctly, allowing Olaf to quickly eliminate high-priority targets. Finally, Olaf's ultimate ability, Ragnarok, grants him immunity to crowd control effects and increases his attack damage, making him an unstoppable force on the battlefield.

Olaf's strengths lie in his ability to dive into the enemy team and disrupt their backline. With his ultimate ability, Ragnarok, Olaf can charge through enemy lines without fear of being disabled, allowing him to reach high-value targets and eliminate them quickly. His sustain from Vicious Strikes and his true damage from Reckless Swing make him a formidable duelist, capable of taking on even the tankiest of opponents.

However, Olaf does have his weaknesses. He lacks mobility compared to some other champions, making it difficult for him to engage or disengage from fights. Additionally, Olaf's reliance on his own health for damage and sustain means that he can be vulnerable to burst damage and crowd control effects if caught off guard.

In conclusion, Olaf is a champion who embodies the spirit of a relentless warrior, always seeking out new challenges and conquests. His Marauder Olaf skin further enhances his fearsome presence on the battlefield, with its intricate details and fiery visual effects.
